**Edited <time datetime="2016-12-22T21:13:14Z" title="12/22/2016 09:13  PM" data-short="7 yr">December 22, 2016</time> by Beale**

Ok, here's the download link for my space center.

[Download](https://mega.nz/#!xEZmQDxZ!KM70d7d42XCH2_pZ_7ToXrKqBq4PvMWPhWcdYhdFCz8)

Obviously, this requires kerbal konstructs to work. to install it, simply drag the "Bealekor" folder straight into the "KerbalKonstructs" folder in Gamedata.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-12-28T16:16:03Z" title="12/28/2016 04:16  PM" data-short="7 yr">December 28, 2016</time> by Third\_OfFive**

[@Third_OfFive](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/142954-third_offive/) great rework of the original model. One suggestion I would like to make is to add a ladder or a ramp (or something) to get down off the crawlway/pad to the base level of the compound.

Yeah I was thinking of adding a ramp made of gravel or something on the side of the launchpad. That is, once I find the proper textures for it.

So yeah, the coordinates are entirely off, but that was mentioned in the <abbr title="Original Post(er). The first post in a thread, or the person who posted it.">OP</abbr>. I tried to move it with the Ctrl+K menu, but it ended up breaking the game a la Danny2462. I do realise it's unfinished, but I'd love for you and [@Third_OfFive](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/142954-third_offive/) to finish your spaceports.
